__TOC__

You'll need to run <code>po2debconf ubiquity.templates > ubiquity.templates-stripped</code> in debian/ first.
<pre>

if [ -n "$1" ]; then
        branch="$1"
else
        branch="ubiquity.trunk"
fi
[ -f /var/lib/apt/periodic/update-success-stamp ] || sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get -y --force-yes install nfs-common portmap vim debconf-utils
sudo mkdir -p /srv/ubiquity
if ! $(mount | grep "on /srv/ubiquity" -q); then
        sudo mount 10.0.2.2:/home/evan/bzr/$branch /srv/ubiquity
fi
if ! $(mount | grep "/srv/ubiquity/gui/gtk on" -q); then
        sudo mount --bind /srv/ubiquity/gui/gtk /usr/share/ubiquity/gtk
fi
if ! $(mount | grep "/srv/ubiquity/ubiquity on" -q); then
        sudo mount --bind /srv/ubiquity/ubiquity/ /usr/lib/ubiquity/ubiquity
fi
if ! $(mount | grep "/srv/ubiquity/ubiquity/plugins on" -q); then
        sudo mount --bind /srv/ubiquity/ubiquity/plugins/ /usr/lib/ubiquity/plugins
fi
sudo ln -sf /srv/ubiquity/scripts/install.py /usr/share/ubiquity
sudo ln -sf /srv/ubiquity/scripts/plugininstall.py /usr/share/ubiquity
sudo ln -sf /srv/ubiquity/scripts/update-apt-cache /usr/share/ubiquity
sudo ln -sf /srv/ubiquity/scripts/simple-plugins /usr/share/ubiquity
sudo mount --bind /srv/ubiquity/pixmaps /usr/share/ubiquity/pixmaps
sudo ln -sf /srv/ubiquity/bin/{ubiquity-dm,ubiquity-wireless-manager} /usr/bin
sudo ln -sf /srv/ubiquity/bin/ubiquity-wrapper /usr/bin/ubiquity
sudo ln -sf /srv/ubiquity/dbus/com.ubuntu.ubiquity.WirelessManager.conf /etc/dbus-1/system.d
sudo ln -sf /srv/ubiquity/dbus/com.ubuntu.ubiquity.WirelessManager.service /usr/share/dbus-1/system-services

sudo debconf-loadtemplate ubiquity /srv/ubiquity/debian/ubiquity.templates-stripped

sudo cp /srv/ubiquity/src/cheese/.libs/* /usr/lib/ubiquity/ubiquity
sudo apt-get -y --force-yes install libcheese-gtk18
</pre>
